name: Die To Suvive
description:
You have been sent underground to bring back the five lost power sources.

You have to find and collect them, but even if there is no enemy, this place is full of danger!

Your suit needs energy to keep you alive. Once this energy is gone, you die, and create a new energy source.

Move with arrows or Q & D
Jump with spacebar

There is no animations nor sounds, but you can play and finish the game!
Made for the 39th Ludum Dare, theme "Running Out Of Power", in about 12 hours.
